description:
Want to serenade your sweetheart?
How about setting the mood?
Want an app that you can show your friends?

Now you've got an app that will give you something to talk about!

A full 3D fountain app in the palm of your hand!

Simple controls allow you to easily rotate fountains in full 3D space!

This app is sure to please and worth every penny!

Great for:

-Lovers
-Students (Listen to the soothing sounds of water while studying)
-Business professionals (Keep a unique fountain at your desk)
-Teachers (Have something to share with your students (If you teach younger children) or even keep a fountain on your table)
-Ice Breakers (Want to have something to talk about at the next party? This is the way to do it!)

Check out the great features:

• Over 10 Full 3D Fountains to choose from
• Show the true power of your device
• Simple controls (Use your finger to rotate 3D scene in REAL TIME!)
• Various musical backgrounds
• The BEST app to show off the power of the Kindle Fire!
• Includes 4 unique musical backgrounds
• Includes authentic water fountain sounds!
